PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-16942017-12-15,  NRCAN,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectIssuances of Amending AO 009 GC 113 and AO-001-GC-123
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board (NEB) to modify (1) Certificate GC-113 will be varied to reflect the final list of assets that have been transferred from NGTL to ATCO Gas and Pipelines Ltd. (ATCO), and that will no longer be under federal jurisdiction and therefore not regulated by the National Energy Board (NEB or Board); and (2) Certificate GC-123 will be varied to reflect the final list of assets that have been transferred from ATCO to NGTL, and that will be under federal jurisdiction and be regulated by the NEB.
AttachmentsAttachment
